title: 103_hr3592
content: Social Security Flat Rate COLA Act of 1993 - Amends titles II , XVI , and XVIII (Medicare) part B of the Social Security Act and the veterans' benefits program to make changes in the method of calculating cost of living adjustments (COLAs), basing such COLAs solely on the percentage increase in the Consumer Price Index. Amends the Internal Revenue Code with respect to COLAs to limitations on benefits and contributions under qualified plans.
